body_html: I think that the perf of NCHW + transpose might be similar to NHWC alone (it's a faster and more optimized data format for GPUs). But I guess we can leave the issue open with a very low priority, unless someone can demonstrate some benefits.
body_text: I think that the perf of NCHW + transpose might be similar to NHWC alone (it's a faster and more optimized data format for GPUs). But I guess we can leave the issue open with a very low priority, unless someone can demonstrate some benefits.
body: I think that the perf of NCHW + transpose might be similar to NHWC alone (it's a faster and more optimized data format for GPUs). But I guess we can leave the issue open with a very low priority, unless someone can demonstrate some benefits.
